media:group.media:title: Virtual Machine Full Course
media:group.media:description:
In computing, a virtual machine (VM) is the virtualization/emulation of a computer system. Virtual machines are based on computer architectures and provide functionality of a physical computer. Their implementations may involve specialized hardware, software, or a combination. In this #virtual_machine course you will learn about the following topics.



⭐️ Table of Content ⭐️ 
⌨️ (0:00) Introduction to virtual machine
⌨️ (2:26) Importing virtual machine into virtual box
⌨️ (5:14) Stopping a VM
⌨️ (7:19) Resizing the user interface
⌨️ (9:59) Keyboard configuration of a VM
⌨️ (11:31) Networking between host and VM
⌨️ (16:01) VM hardware configuration
⌨️ (18:37) Setting up APACHE2 in #VM
⌨️ (25:17) Serving website with VM APACHE2
⌨️ (31:47) Setting up PHP in VM
⌨️ (41:43) Creating a RESTFUL API backend in VM
